Headline: Purple Line Service Delayed at Linden
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are standing at Linden due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are standing at Linden due to police activity. 

Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Linden to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
